item.title: Automating Syllabus Updating
item.description: In my previous post I mentioned off-handedly the task of updating the dates on my syllabi as I transition from the Fall to the Spring to the Summer semesters. I figured I would post some of the code to help out with this tiny little mini-project. (All the code for this is available in the following repository.) I have a pretty simple Canvas main page that has all the dates, readings, and assignments laid out in a simple little tableâ€”all on one main page:
